Key Match Events: India's 15-match unbeaten run at home came to an end
Qatar took the lead early on in the 4th minute
Amrinder made an incredible save in the 23rd minute
Sandesh Jhingan made a crucial save in the 57th minute
Yusuf Abdurisag scored in the 86th minute
Pre-Game Insights: Qatar coach Carlos Queiroz said his team is excited about the match and happy to be in India
India football team coach Igor Stimac urged his players to give it their all and win the match
Post-Match Reflections: India underperformed against Qatar and lost the match 0-3
India's 15-match home unbeaten run also came to an end
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at the Kalinga Stadium in Bhubaneshwar
The match was part of the FIFA World Cup 2026 AFC qualifiers
